text: Draga Olteanu Matei (née Olteanu) (; 24 October 1933 – 18 November 2020) was a Romanian actress. She starred in more than thirty movies from 1967 to 2006."Draga Olteanu Matei and Mircea Albulescu on Walk of Fame", HotNews.ro She was born in Bucharest. Her best known roles were in A Bomb Was Stolen (1961), Haiducii (1966), Explosion (1973), Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and in The Famous Paparazzo (1999). Matei died at a hospital in Iași, Romania on 18 November 2020 from a gastrointestinal hemorrhage, aged 87.Actriţa Draga Olteanu Matei a încetat din viaţă ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from gastrointestinal hemorrhage Category:Disease-related deaths in Romania Category:Romanian movie actors Category:Romanian television actors Category:Romanian stage actors Category:Actors from Bucharest
title: Draga Olteanu Matei
